item.title: By: SoCalMtnBiker
item.dc:creator: SoCalMtnBiker
item.description:
Thank you for the article.
redability -> readability. Too bad it doesn't rate spelling errors. Spelling errors and homophone errors hurt readability too.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for the article.

redability -> readability. Too bad it doesn’t rate spelling errors. Spelling errors and homophone errors hurt readability too.
